remark.ch: 中高級課程。大學部課程。 建議TOEIC多益英語測驗程度600分以上的學生選修。分發條件:(1)上課缺席者，須和學校請假，否則扣學期總成績。(2)前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。(3)修過職場英文者，禁修商用英文.

goal.en: The course objectives are as follows: 1. Establish a foundation of concepts in business English for students. 2. Familiarize students with the writing patterns of English emails. 3. Understand various contexts of business English. 4. Acquire the ability to engage in appropriate English conversations in various business situations. 5. Enhance skills in delivering English presentations. 6. Cultivate techniques for conducting meetings in English.
goal.ch: 課程目標如下： 1. 建立學生基礎商業英文的概念 2. 熟悉英文電子郵件的寫作模式 3. 理解商業英文的各種情境 4. 懂得如何在各種商務情境進行適當的英文對話 5. 提升英文簡報的能力 6. 培養使用英文進行會議的技巧

grading.en: 1. Attendance (10％): Attendance is mandatory. For each class-hour absence, 2 points will be deducted from the final grade. A medical leave requires proof of medical care, and all other excused leaves also require proof. All students are expected to attend class on time; for each tardiness, 1 point will be deducted. An absence of more than 5 class-hours will result in a failing grade for the course. Please note that students who miss the first class will not be allowed to take this course. 2. Participation (10％): Students enrolled in this course must actively participate in in-class events. 3. Midterm Exam (20％) and Final Exam (20％): Both exams include sections on speaking, writing, reading, and listening. All question types will be introduced at least two weeks in advance. 4. Weekly Assignments (15％): Students will receive course-related writing assignments. 5. Quizzes (10％): 6. Group Presentation (15％): 7. Around week 15, all students will deliver oral presentations based on the materials learned in groups.
